data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kumar, Girish P., Lelej, Arkady S., Das, Dipanwita, Raveendran, Hanima K. P., Loktionov, Valery M. (2019): Discovery of the genus Kudakrumia Krombein, 1979 (Hymenoptera: Mutillidae) in India and description of a new species. Zootaxa 4612 (2): 260-266, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4612.2.8|8 occurrences
